hero.bio: I build pixel-perfect, engaging, and accessible digital experiences. Specialized in {nextjs} and {design}.

about.title: About
about.intro: I am a passionate developer with expertise in web development. My goal is to create innovative digital solutions that meet my clients' needs.
about.education: Holding a degree in computer science and management, I pay particular attention to detail and always strive to deliver the best results.
about.passion: Problem-solving is my passion, and I am always motivated to learn new things. Outside of coding hours, I enjoy playing football or watching movies and series.
about.cta: Feel free to contact me if you want to collaborate on something interesting!

projects.title: Work
projects.subtitle: A selection of projects that define my journey as a developer and designer.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: I offer complete web solutions, from design to production. Specialized in {nextjs}, {react}, and {typescript}.

cta.title: Have a project in mind?
cta.description: Let's discuss your project and see how I can help bring it to life.

webdev.title: Web Development
webdev.description: Building modern, fast, and SEO-optimized websites. Using the latest technologies like Next.js, React, and TypeScript.

saas.title: SaaS Applications
saas.description: Development of complete SaaS platforms with authentication, payments, and custom dashboards.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Custom e-commerce solutions with product management, shopping cart, and secure payment processing.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: Designing modern and intuitive user interfaces with particular attention to user experience.

webapps.title: Web Applications
webapps.description: Development of complex web applications with advanced features and third-party integrations.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Support
maintenance.description: Ongoing technical support, security updates, and performance optimization for your existing applications.

projects_preview.title: Selected Work
projects_preview.subtitle: A closer look at some of the projects I've been working on recently.

about.p1: I'm a passionate developer based in Benin, obsessed with creating digital experiences that feel alive. My approach combines technical precision with artistic direction.
about.p2: I believe that a website shouldn't just be functional; it should be memorable. Whether it's a SaaS platform or a portfolio, I aim for the "WOW" effect.

webdev.title: Web Development
webdev.desc: Fast, accessible, and SEO-friendly websites using Next.js.

saas.title: SaaS Products
saas.desc: Full-cycle development from idea to launch.

skills.title: Technical Arsenal
skills.subtitle: The tools I use to bring ideas to life.

contact.title: Let's work together
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? I'd love to help you build it.
